categories.title: Meditation Spot
categories.info: Meditation Spots unlock 1 free Skill Point.  Finding all Meditation Spots awards the _Scenic Seeker_ achievement

categories.title: Awaken Wine Worm
categories.info: Awaken Wine Worms increase the healing effectiveness of your Gourd

categories.title: Celestial Pill
categories.info:
Celestial Jade Lotus Pills increase maximum health.

Celestial Nonary Pills increase maximum stamina.

Celestial Taiyi Pills increase maximum mana.

categories.title: Luojia Fragrant Vine
categories.info: Luojia Fragrant Vines each give you an extra charge for your Gourd

categories.title: Curio
categories.info: Curios act as accessories and can offer minor buffs or stat boosts

locations.title: Front Hills
locations.description: **Location:** Kill the Wolf Scout and the Wolf Stalwart and the golden trail will lead you here.

locations.title: Outside the Forest
locations.description: **Location:** Just outside the small cave

locations.title: Ancient Guanyin Temple Shrine
locations.description:
**Location:** [Ancient Guanyin Temple](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397380)

**Shop:**
- Evil Repelling Medicament (x2)
- Longevity Decoction (x2)
- Silk (x2)
- Yaoguai Core (x2)

locations.title: Marsh of White Mist
locations.description: **Location:** By the edge of the path

locations.title: Bodhi Peak
locations.description: The last shrine of the chapter, this can be found after ascending many stairs, immediately to the right. This shrine is also right before the  final boss of the chapter.

locations.description: **Location:** Inside the cavern

locations.title: The Cliff, Black Wind Cave

locations.title: 3-Year-Old Coconut Wine
locations.description:
**Location:** Obtained by upgrading the starter Coconut Wine Drink  

**Effect:**  Each sip restores 36% of maximum health

locations.title: 5-Year-Old Coconut Wine
locations.description:
**Location:** Obtained by upgrading the starter [3-Year-Old Coconute Wine](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=398848)  

**Effect:**  Each sip restores 40% of maximum health

locations.title: 10-Year-Old Coconut Wine
locations.description:

locations.title: 18-Year-Old Coconut Wine

locations.title: 30-Year-Old Coconut Wine

locations.title: Trailblazer's Scarlet Gourd
locations.description: **Location:** Deluxe edition exclusive (pre-order only).  Found in front of the [Front Hills](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397271) shrine.

locations.title: Skandha of Form
locations.description:
**Location:** Inspect the head-shaped boulder by the waterfall where the [Rat Guai](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397280) was skulking about.

Note: Unknown what this item does at the moment

locations.title: Luojia Fragrant Vine

**Location:** Inside the small shrine

locations.title: Will
locations.description: At end of broken bridge

locations.title: Grey Wolf Mask
locations.description:
Rewarded for defeating [Lingxuzi](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397299)

**Type:** Headgear  

**Rarity:** Uncommon  

**Defence:** 10  
   
**Effect:** Inflicts considerably more bonus damage on enemies at critical health

locations.title: Folk Set
locations.description:
Deluxe edition exclusive.  Found in front of the [Front Hills](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397271) shrine.

**Set Pieces:**
- Folk Opera Mask (Headgear)
- Folk Opera Almsgiving Armor (Body)
- Folk Opera Leather Bracers (Arms)
- Folk Opera, Buskins (Legs)

**Rarity:** Uncommon 

**Defence:** 7 / 14 /  5 / 8
   
**Set Bonus:** Every Bit Counts: Moderately increases the Will gained from defeating enemies (Requires 4 Pieces Equipped)

locations.title: Guanyin's Prayer Beads
locations.description:
**Location:** Found in a chest surrounding a dead tree within the secret [Ancient Guanyin Temple](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397380)

**Type:** Arms  

**Rarity:** Uncommon 

**Defence:** 10 
   
**Effect:** After absorbing lingering will, moderately increase Maximum Health and Mana for a long duration

locations.title: Pilgrim's Set
locations.description:
Craftable upon reaching [Guanyin Temple Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397382) in the Forest of Wolves.  

**Set Pieces:**
- Pilgrim's Headband (Headgear)
- Pilgrim's Garb (Body)
- Pilgrim's Wristwraps (Arms)
- Pilgrim's Legwraps (Legs)

**Rarity:** Uncommon 

**Defence:** 7 / 14 /  5 / 8
   
**Unique Effect:** Allows using the Gourd while sprinting (headgear)

**Set Bonus:** 
- Swift Pilgrim - Moderately increases sprint speed (2 pieces equipped)
- When Sprinting, each second moderately increases attack. This effect can stack up to 10 times. (4 pieces equipped)

**Ingredients Required:**
- 4 Yarn, 1,000 Will (Head)
- 5 Yarn, 1,200 Will (Body)
- 1 Yarn, 500 Will (Arms)
- 2 Yarn, 640 Will (Legs)

locations.title: Serpentscale Set
locations.description:
Craftable upon defeating the [Whiteclad Noble](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397389) 

**Set Pieces:**
- Serpentscale Battlerobe (Body)
- Serpentscale Bracers (Arms)
- Serpentscale Gaiters (Legs)

**Rarity:** Uncommon 

**Defence:**  18 /  7 / 11
   
**Unique Effect:** 
- When health is low, slowly recovers a small amount of health; if in water, the effect is enhanced (body)	
- 3% Poison Resistance (arms)
- 2% Poison Resistance (legs)	

**Set Bonus:** 
- Wave Rider - Massively reduces stamina cost when in water (3 pieces equipped)

**Ingredients Required:**
- 5 Yarn, 1,350 Will (body)
- 1 Yarn, 720 Will (arms)
- 2 Yarn, 720 Will (legs)

locations.title: Bronze Set
locations.description:
**Location:** Craftable upon defeating [Elder Jinchi](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397381) at the Secret [Ancient Guanyin Temple](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397380)

**Set Pieces:**
- Bronze Monkey Mask (Headgear)
- Bronze Brocade Battlerobe (Body)
- Bronze armguard (Arms)
- Bronze buskins (Legs)

**Rarity:** Rare 

**Defence:**  16 / 29 /  12 / 17
   
**Unique Effect:** 
- Performing light attack folling Evanescene directly triggers the finisher of light attack combo (arms)	
- 3% Burn Resistance (headgear), 4% Burn Resistance (arms)

**Set Bonus:** 
- Evil Crasher - Deals addition damage to the enemy upon crashing their immobilization (2 pieces equipped)
- Upon crashing the immobilization of the enemy, massively reduces the cooldown for Immobilize spell (4 pieces equipped)


**Ingredients Required:**
- 4 Yarn, 1 Silk, 810 Will (headgear)
- 5 Yarn, 2 Silk, 2,000 Will (body)
- 1 Yarn, 1 Silk, 810 Will (arms)
- 2 Yarn, 1 Silk, 1,080 Will (legs)

locations.title: Ebongold Set
locations.description:
**Location:** Craftable upon defeating [Black Bear Guai](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397388) at the end of Chapter 1

**Set Pieces:**
- Ebongold Silk Robe (Body)
- Ebongold Armguard (Arms)
- Ebongold Gaiters (Legs)

**Rarity:** Rare 

**Defence:**  31 /  13 / 19
   
**Unique Effect:** 
- 4% Burn Resistance (arms)	
- After a moment in Cloud Step, considerably increases Unveiling Strike damage (legs)  
- 2% Poison Resistance (legs)	

**Set Bonus:** 
- Dance of the Black Wind: In Cloud Step, shrouding black wind will attack enemies nearby the Destined One and the decoy continuously (4 pieces required ?? - Glitch??)	

**Ingredients Required:**
- 5 Yarn, 2 Silk, 1,800 Will (body)
- 1 Yarn, 1 Silk, 810 Will (arms)
- 4 Yarn, 2 Silk, 1,080 Will (legs)

locations.title: Cat's Eye Beads
locations.description: Reward for defeating the [Wandering Wight](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397294)

locations.title: Back Scratcher
locations.description:
**Location:** Available to purchase for Chapter 1 Shrines after defeating [Black Bear Guai](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397388).  Costs 2,400

**Effect:** Considerably increases maximum stamina

locations.title: Immobilize
locations.description: **Location:** Received from the Keeper of Black Wind Mountain during the [Bullguard](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397283) fight

locations.title: Red Tides
locations.description: **Location:** Reward for defeating [Guangzhi](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397296)

locations.title: Cloud Step
locations.description: **Location:** Reward for defeating [Black Wind King](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397387)

locations.title: Fireproof Mantle Vessel
locations.description: **Location:** Rewarded for defeating [Elder Jinchi](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397381) in the [Ancient Guanyin Temple](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397380)

locations.title: Bronze Cloud Staff
locations.description: Deluxe edition exclusive.  Found in front of the [Front Hills](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397271) shrine.

locations.title: Twin Serpents Staff
locations.description:
**Location:** Craftable upon defeating the [Whiteclad Noble](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397389) in Bamboo Grove  

**Damage:** 40  
**Critical Chance:** N/A  

**Unique Effect:** Moderately increases the damage of light attack combo finishers. The effect is massively enhanced when fighting in water.  

**Crafting Ingredients:* 
- 1 Jade Fang
- 8 Stone Spirit
- 2,700 Will

locations.title: Wind Bear Staff
locations.description:
**Location:** Craftable upon defeating the [Black Bear Guai](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397388) at the end of Chapter 1

**Damage:** 50  
**Critical Chance:** 4% Critical Hit Chance	   

**Unique Effect:** Considerably increases the critical hit chance of the Unveiling Strike of Cloud Step	

**Crafting Ingredients:** 
- 1 Flame Ebongold
- 4 Yaoguai Core
- 8 Stone Spirit
- 8,100 Will

locations.title: Red Loong
locations.description:
**Location:** Inside the hidden [Waterfall Cave](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=398283).  You must first obtain the [Loong Scales](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-2?locationIds=398767) from Chapter 2 to pass through the waterfall.

**Reward:**
- Boshan Censer
- Thunder Tail
- Loong Pearl
- Mind Core
- Silk
- 1652 Experience
- 1376 Will

locations.title: Bell #1
locations.description: Interact with the pole to ring the bell. Activate all 3 bells to reveal the [Ancient Guanyin Temple](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397380)

locations.title: Ancient Guanyin Temple
locations.description:
A secret area that can only be accessed by ringing the 3 Bells:

- [Bell #1](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397298)
- [Bell #2](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397473)
- [Bell #3](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397472)

locations.title: Bell #3
locations.description: Interact with the pole to ring the bell. Activate all 3 bells to reveal the [Ancient Guanyin Temple](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397380)

locations.title: Bell #2
locations.description:
**Location:** Up the stairs from the [Guangmou](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397385) arena

Interact with the pole to ring the bell. Activate all 3 bells to reveal the [Ancient Guanyin Temple](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?locationIds=397380)

locations.title: Secret: Waterfall Cave
